Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is valued at $15000 by us due to its unique features, durability, and the extensive research and development that went into its creation. We believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its unparalleled benefits, we kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at the same value of $15000. We are confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
